attributes.action: Return Income Tax Levels to Pre April 2008 Rates (i.e; 10%, 20% & 40% rates)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The move to 'update' income tax will have a negative effect on the public's disposable income.  Far more people will lose than gain from this move - it seems a case of the rich getting richer!  As an NHS employee I know very very few people who gain, but many who care for the sick of this land who will now struggle to survive financially when this impacts their already lower rates of pay.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
